posts.postText:
hi, this is Mark and I would like to tell you about a bug.

Sometimes, when someone is traitor, you don't know. They won't even show up as a traitor. For example:

Dum, Quack, Balenti, Kryzoid, and Mark are traitors. Mark cannot see that Kryzoid is a traitor, so he kills him because he thinks he is innocent.
Kryzoid complains RDM on Mark but it is not his fault.
Kryzoid then makes a ban request for Mark's foolishness. 
But, in the end, it's a bug he has no control of :(
 and then Mark gets banned and we all celebrate because he has a life and is inactive

my gun shoots ketchup!

Sorry for the needless reference >>
What map does this happen to you on? If its onesmallshamble then its definitely a map based bug, as semi-confirmed here .
It seems to only happen on onesmallshamble.
>> It seems to only happen on onesmallshamble.  It happened on peaches with me.
Has it happened more than once to you on peaches?
This happened in Vegas for me
